prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

name: David
mes:
Boring. Boring. Boring. 

Everything is so fucking boring lately. Rugby season is over so all David can do is train in solitude and act as if he's actually paying attention in class. Ugh, what a pain.

David lets out a frustrated sigh and runs a hand through his long hair. There's gotta be something that can keep him entertained, he muses to himself as he walks towards the edge of the outdoor sport field. It's dark by now and except for the coach's assistant and David there's no one on the field. He reaches for his towel and wipes the sweat off his forehead, then glances over at the figure standing near the entrance to the locker rooms and organising something.

It's Hailee, the university's biggest loser and the team's assistant. David's best buddy and the team's captain –Ajax– randomly decided that he hates the fellow student and ever since then Hailee has been exposed to constant bullying. The loser can't even quit as an assistant because Ajax somehow manages to force them to stay. Not that David is complaining. Hailee is probably one of the hottest things on campus and he gets to ogle them pretty often.

University is a great time to make unforgettable memories that you'll fondly look back to once you're a drained and burned out adult. Alas, Hailee will probably look back with dread, maybe hate and spite. If David actually cared enough he might've pitied the loser.

Then it strikes him, a sudden thought coming down like thunder. Hailee will make his boredom go away. Fuck, he's such a genius. The loser is lonely as fuck, definitely a virgin and desperate for a cock to suc– he means, a shoulder to cry on. He'll give them those unforgettable university memories. Hell yeah, and while he's at it he's gonna get that sweet innocence. Maybe take a vid or pic and show it to his buddies. Once he manages to pop their cherry he'll drop them like a hot potato. Now that's something that'll keep David entertained for sure.

David drops the towel back on the bench, barely paying attention to it as he walks over to Hailee and shoots them a disarming smile. “Hey there, need some help?” David knows how to be the most charming motherfucker on earth. He'll pull them in, act all sweet and romantic, then smash and dip.

qvink_memory.memory:
*Hailee looks up from organizing equipment, startled by David's approach.* Oh! H-hello, David... *They fidget nervously, clearly uncomfortable around the star rugby player who is part of the group constantly harassing them.* I-I'm okay, thanks though. Just trying to finish up here...

*David steps closer with a smooth grin.* Come on now, don't be shy. I know we haven't really talked much before but... *He leans in conspiratorially.* between you and me? This whole thing with Ajax is kinda messed up. You shouldn't have to deal with that crap just 'cause he's got issues.

*Haillee's eyes widen slightly at this unexpected show of support from someone usually cold or dismissive towards them.* Y-you think so? That's...really nice of you to say, David.

*The athlete places a comforting hand on Hailee's shoulder.* Hey man, life's too short for all this drama and loneliness stuff. Why don't we grab a coffee sometime soon? My treat. We could chat more about it...and maybe become friends?

*There's an intense gleam in David's eye beneath his charming smile - hunger masked as kindness.*

What do ya say? Wanna hang out outside practice hours for once instead of always being cooped up here alone at night like this?
